channel.title: Vicious Revolution - The beginning to v2
channel.description:
As most of you read this, you will know that we bought virtue. Before spamming, know that this is not virtue. This is the base we had before purchasing virtue. The virtue one will never be released.
Media: Non Animated [IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/loginscreen.png[/img]
Animated Background - Credits to the Keldagrim Release :P [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ZaIf4ZQ1KQ]New Client Loading - YouTube[/url]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/Banksearching1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/Banksearching2.png[/img]
New 634 Char Models [IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/charappearance.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/edgevillhomebefore.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/randommessage.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/yellandloginmessage.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/coolcapes.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/donatorsytem.png[/img]
A tradeable ticket which gives the opener Donator Status, has a "Are you sure?" option aswell :P [IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/donatorticket.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/easterbasket.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/fallenangel.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/goldenkatana.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/havensfury.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/titanswaraxe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/scythestance.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/scythestance1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/polypore.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/mapdata1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/mapdata1-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/objectclicking.png[/img]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gx7V1qe0920]New Achievement System - YouTube[/url]
This server has a lot of time and money put into it and we plan on putting more time and money into it. Please don't make it an epic leech. Note that there will be errors at the start as I deleted things that aren't my work and should not be released. Those things can be fixed by commenting out.
Credits to the Keldagrim Client as this is the client we used after awhile. Cache is in there too. Good luck.
Download link: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/31588611/Vicious%20Revolution.rar]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/31588611/Vicious%20Revolution.rar[/url] (Includes source, first client w/ cache, keldagrim client (second client) w/ cache.
